originalText.text: Wonderfully kind and respectful owners who always have my items in great condition. There are about 3 to 4 cleaners in a block radius from me but I still walk the avenue down to come here. Absolute joy to have them here.

text.text: Wonderfully kind and respectful owners who always have my items in great condition. There are about 3 to 4 cleaners in a block radius from me but I still walk the avenue down to come here. Absolute joy to have them here.

originalText.text: Best dry cleaner in the world!!! The owners are the most genuine, honest, and kind people in the world. We were so lucky to live nearby and try them as our first dry cleaners in the city. They do an incredible job and charge such fair prices. We couldn’t be happier with our experiences here.

text.text: Best dry cleaner in the world!!! The owners are the most genuine, honest, and kind people in the world. We were so lucky to live nearby and try them as our first dry cleaners in the city. They do an incredible job and charge such fair prices. We couldn’t be happier with our experiences here.

originalText.text:
Smells like old body grease clothes. My husband sent suits here to be dry cleaned. First time thought it was his suit because it was old.
Recently sent a brand new suit and it started smelling like it’s been worn for years. Do others notice this smell? You can’t smell at the store because too many factors. Must be in neutralized place
Want to know how often they clean and sanitize their equipments especially if they get a lot of customers.

text.text:

Want to know how often they clean and sanitize their equipments especially if they get a lot of customers.

originalText.text: Best dry cleaner in the neighborhood. They are the friendliest, sweetest people and always go the extra mile. Have been using them for years and have never been disappointed. Highly recommend.

text.text: Best dry cleaner in the neighborhood. They are the friendliest, sweetest people and always go the extra mile. Have been using them for years and have never been disappointed. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Extremely nice people run this business, and it is very reasonably priced for the area! And I never had any problem with my dry cleaning. Thank you!

text.text: Extremely nice people run this business, and it is very reasonably priced for the area! And I never had any problem with my dry cleaning. Thank you!
